DOC.brief_summary: Establishing the association between biological markers and exercise capacity in continuous-flow left ventricular assist device patients.
DOC.brief_title: Biological Markers Predicting Exercise Capacity in CF-LVAD Patients.
DOC.detailed_description: The aim of this study is to investigate if specific biological markers can predict exercise capacity in advanced heart failure patients supported with continuous-flow left ventricular assist device patients.
DOC.criteria: Stable CFLVAD patients. Unstable CFLVAD patients.
